Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context

Class ChildChannelContext<PARENT,CHILD,PAYLOAD>

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context.ChildChannelContext<PARENT,CHILD,PAYLOAD>
Type Parameters:
CHILD - the child context to extract.
PARENT - the parent context.
PAYLOAD - the payload used to find the child in the parent.
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelContext<CHILD>
public class ChildChannelContext<PARENT,CHILD,PAYLOAD> extends Object implements ChannelContext<CHILD>
A channel context that wraps another channel context, extracting extra information from it.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a new child channel context that is capable of finding a child context based on a parent context.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChildChannelContext

      public ChildChannelContext(@NotNull @NotNull ChannelContext<PARENT> parentChannelContext, @NotNull @NotNull PayloadCodec<PAYLOAD> codec, @NotNull @NotNull ChildContextDecoder<PARENT,CHILD,PAYLOAD> decoder, @NotNull @NotNull ContextEncoder<CHILD,PAYLOAD> encoder, @NotNull @NotNull ParentContextFinder<PARENT,CHILD> parentFinder)
      Creates a new child channel context that is capable of finding a child context based on a parent context.
      Parameters:
      parentChannelContext - the channel context this wraps and who supplies the parent context.
      codec - the codec for the payload holding information about the child.
      decoder - the decoder for finding the child in the parent based on the information supplied by the payload.
      encoder - the encoder for encoding child-specific information into a payload.
      parentFinder - the way to get the parent when given the child.
